captions.text:
Yeah, I just started
working out this morning,

so I need a little revamp
on my wardrobe

for the new body
I'm about to have.

Oh, my God, fabulous.
What's your fitness plan?

Well, I switched
to Diet Snapple

and I bought
a tiny house trampoline.

So, you know, a change
a-gonna come.

And what size are you thinking
your new body's gonna be?

Uh, I'm definitely
gonna be a size 2.

Congratulations.
That's such a great size.

And is there any special
occasion you're preparing for?

Yeah, I've been catfishing
a guy in Michigan

and sending him
pictures of Kate Bosworth

and we're supposed
to meet up in two weeks.

I love everything
about that plan.

Why don't we walk over
here to the "five months
from now" section?

Oh, my God,
I love this.

That's a size smaller
than I was thinking

Doesn't it make you
want to kill yourself?

If I were you, I would just
make my delusional diet

Then it will
hang on you.

Do you have a place where I can
sit and eat this muffin?

Honestly, I love this
for future you.

when all your lies
are exposed in Michigan.

The best part about it
is it's so easy.

Also, is there
a place I can sit

Oh, yeah, right where
you had the first one.
